title: Epileptic Seizure Prediction Using Electroencephalogram Signals
details: RR Borhade, V Bairagi, MS Nagmode, RH Borhade
abstract: This book presents an innovative method of EEG-based feature extraction and classification of seizures using EEG signals. It describes the methodology required for EEG analysis, seizure detection, seizure prediction and seizure classification. It …
